titles.title: To require a report by the Comptroller General of the United States on a national all-hazards disaster insurance program.
To require a report by the Comptroller General of the United States on a national all-hazards disaster insurance program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Financial Services.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Government Accountability Office to report on the feasibility of a national disaster insurance program that covers all hazards.
